about_the_game:
Embark on an enthralling adventure with Alice as she sets out on her much-awaited vacation, eagerly anticipating a well-deserved break from the monotony of daily life. Excitement courses through her veins as she boards the plane, her mind filled with visions of relaxation and exploration in exotic locales.

However, fate has other plans in store for Alice.

What begins as minor disturbances soon escalates into a series of inexplicable events that plunge Alice into a whirlwind of chaos and uncertainty. The once-promising journey quickly morphs into a harrowing ordeal as Alice grapples with the unsettling realization that something sinister is afoot.

Amidst the chaos, questions swirl in Alice's mind. Are these disruptions mere coincidences, or is there a deeper, darker force at play? With each passing moment, the mystery deepens, drawing Alice deeper into a web of intrigue and danger.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content.
The characters are all over 18 years old.

Excitement courses through her veins as she boards the plane, her mind filled with visions of relaxation and exploration in exotic locales.

What begins as minor disturbances soon escalates into a series of inexplicable events that plunge Alice into a whirlwind of chaos and uncertainty. The once-promising journey quickly morphs into a harrowing ordeal as Alice grapples with the unsettling realization that something sinister is afoot.

Amidst the chaos, questions swirl in Alice's mind. Are these disruptions mere coincidences, or is there a deeper, darker force at play? With each passing moment, the mystery deepens, drawing Alice deeper into a web of intrigue and danger.
name: Alice - Island Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB VRAM
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience Alice's long-awaited vacation turn into a tumultuous journey in this gripping visual novel. As her plans unravel, she faces unforeseen challenges, testing her resilience. Will she emerge stronger or succumb to the unexpected twists of fate?
